titleStmt.title: A plea for the holy sacrament being an attempt to rescue it from some late prophanations in civil matters. In a letter to a Member of Parliament. By a Lay-hand. Licensed, March 25, 1689. James Fraser.
titleStmt.author: Lay-hand.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for R. Baldwin, near the Black Bull in the Old-Baily,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
